edu.mines.jtk.mesh

Interface TetMesh.NodeListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    TetMesh

    public static interface TetMesh.NodeListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Implemented to monitor the addition and removal of nodes in the mesh. When node listeners are called, the mesh is valid. Therefore, classes can safely call any tet mesh method in their implementations of this interface.

    Classes that maintain references to nodes in a tet mesh should implement this interface. Those references are almost certainly invalid (and may prevent garbage collection) after nodes are removed from the mesh.
